hudson.tasks.Shell.command:
export VMNAME="SCDEV-centos" /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init login /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init build /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init start securitycloud-centos7-metacloud /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'wget http://esb.metacentrum.cz/puppet-securitycloud.git/bootstrap.install.sh && sh -x bootstrap.install.sh' ############
/puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh phase2.install.sh'
/puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh securitycloud-dev.install.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh securitycloud/bin/build.sh' /puppet/jenkins/bin/metacloud.init ssh 'cd /puppet && sh securitycloud/tests/fdistdump-singlenode.sh'
